name: Landorus
description: The Abundance Pokémon. The energy that comes pouring from its tail increases the nutrition in the soil, making crops grow to great size.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: During a Sandstorm, this Pokémon can double its STAB when it hits an opponent.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.
